      • setWeights

        public static Vector setWeights(int type,
                java.lang.String path)
        Set weights for a model from a given file This function either sets the new vector to be zeros or reads the data from a given path
        Parameters:
        type - - if this parameter is set to be 0 than the returned vector will be zeros, if 1 than it will populate the vector with the file's data
        path - - the path to the file that contains the vecotr's data
        Returns:
        the new vector

      • convert2Weights

        public static Vector convert2Weights(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> data)
                              throws java.text.ParseException
        Converts an array list of strings into a vector of double this function can be used after reading a vector from a file
        Parameters:
        data - the data 2D array but we treat tim as a 1D array
        Returns:
        a vector that contains the model weights
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
